comments.body: I don't think the RRuleSet is exposed in version 2.1.0. The current master does have it although it is not released yet.

yeah, it's not on 2.1.0. But it's a very handy feature that has been on master for 9 months at least. If it's really strict to be present on npm release, I can send another diff with just the other changes (`between` and `all`), otherwise this might help people like me who decide to go with the latest version on git.
